about_the_game:
Mindcop is a non-linear „whodunnit“ detective game. It mixes a story driven adventure with real-time puzzle gaming. As the infamous Mindcop, you can dive into the minds of your suspects to uncover their secrets and unravel their lies.

Mindcop demo content

  • The full Mindcop game will feature a total of 5 days of investigation in addition to the tutorial. Start your investigation in this new demo with access to the tutorial and part of the first day of investigation.

  • Time is ticking, get the most out of it making hard choices to uncover clues that might lead you toward solving the murder in the full version of Mindcop.

  • This demo is playable in the same languages as the full game.

So if you didn't play earlier demos because of the language barrier, now's the time to check it out!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains elements that may not be suitable for all audiences.

Mild Violence: Scenes of mild violence, including animated depictions of physical conflict. While not graphically realistic, these scenes may not be suitable for all players.

Depictions of Dead Bodies: While presented with non-realistic graphics, the theme of death may be unsettling for some players.

Adult Language: The game includes use of strong language.

Depictions of Drug Taking: Scenes in the game depict characters engaging in drug-related activities.
